Class CineplexSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.CineplexSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MOBLIMASystem
    public class CineplexSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MOBLIMASystem
    Represents a controller system which keeps track of all the cineplexes.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • CineplexSystem

        public CineplexSystem()
        Constructor for the system. It attempts to deserialize the database file. If file does not exist, it will reset the database.

    • Method Detail

      • listCineplex

        public void listCineplex()
        Prints out all the cineplexes in the database.

      • selectCineplex

        public Cineplex selectCineplex()
        Selector tool of cineplex in database. Prints a list of cineplexes, and user will have to select a cineplex using its index as printed.
        Returns:
        cineplex if it exists, else null

      • getCineplex

        public Cineplex getCineplex​(int i)
        Get the cineplex given its index in the array list (index starts from 1).
        Parameters:
        i - index in the array list
        Returns:
        cineplex at the index in the array list

      • getCineplexes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Cineplex> getCineplexes()
        Get all the cineplexes in database.
        Returns:
        array list of all the cineplexes in the database

      • deserialize

        public boolean deserialize()
        Attempts to deserialize the database file into an array list of cineplexes.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether deserialization is successful

      • serialize

        public boolean serialize()
        Attempts to serialize the array list into a database file.
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether serialization is successful

      • resetDatabase

        public boolean resetDatabase()
        Resets the cineplexes database. It has 3 cineplexes, Ang Mo Kio, Bedok and Changi. Each of the cineplex is preloaded with 2 regular halls and 1 golden suite hall.
        Specified by:
        resetDatabase in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether resetting the database is successful
